div.div:
Good morning Woodlake families. This is Mrs. Gonzalez, Superintendent of Woodlake Unified School District. I hope this message finds you all well.
I wanted to reach out to you to let you know that we are monitoring the COVID-19 pandemic very closely. As it stands now, none of the four criteria established previously have been met and so our schools will remain closed until May 15. We plan to evaluate the situation with the Corona virus and send out another message by May 18 with further information.
Our teachers will continue to provide instruction digitally and through other means. Parent consent forms went out and we want to remind you to read, sign and send them back. You can send us an email saying you consent to the use of live video for instructional purposes or you can also take a picture of the signed consent form and email that. Our meal distribution every Monday and Wednesday from 11:00-12:30 at the same four locations. As changes are made, we will contact you with an update via our websites.
Please stay indoors as much as possible and continue washing your hands often. Keep up the good work with your school work and don’t forget to read every day. Reach out to your teacher via email if you need help and check our websites for updates.
Thank you,
Laura A. Gonzalez, Superintendent
----------------------------------------
Buenos días familias de Woodlake. Soy la señora González, la Superintendente del Distrito Escolar Unificado de Woodlake. Espero y este mensaje los encuentre bien a todos ustedes.
Queria comunicarme con ustedes para hacerles saber como está hasta ahora, ninguno de nuestros cuatro criterios anteriormente establecidos han sido cumplidos y así que nuestras escuelas permanecerán cerradas hasta el 15 de Mayo. Planeamos evaluar la situación con el virus y enviar otro mensaje antes del 18 de Mayo con más información.
Nuestros maestros continuarán proporcionando instrucción digital y por medio de otros métodos. Las formas para el consentimiento de los padres fueron enviadas y queremos recordarle de que las lea, las firme y las envíe de regreso. Usted puede enviarnos un correo electrónico diciendo que usted da su consentimiento para el uso de video en vivo con fines de instrucción o puede tomar una fotografía de la forma con su firma y envíela por correo electrónico.
Nuestra distribución de alimentos es cada Lunes y Miércoles de las 11:00-12:30 en los mismos cuatro lugares. A medida que se realicen cambios, le estaremos contactando con una actualizacion a traves de nuestros sitios web.
Por favor manténgase en el interior tanto como sea posible y continúe lavándose las manos con frecuencia. Esperamos que nuestros estudiantes mantengan el buen trabajo con su trabajo escolar y no olvide de leer todos los días. Comuníquese con sus maestros a través del correo electrónico y si necesita ayuda, consulte nuestros sitios web para obtener actualizaciones.
Gracias.
Laura A. Gonzalez, Superintendent

h3.span: We want to encourage our students to continue working on their schoolwork from home. We are looking at all of the assignments that are turned in. Students should be working daily and this chart provides information as to the expectations.

For our students TK-5, the hours are a daily expectation. For our students in grades 6-12, the hours are weekly by content area. In addition to these hours, we highly encourage students to keep reading every day. Research shows that the more students read, the better prepared they are for college and for the next school year.
Keep up the good work, Woodlake Tigers!

a.title: Visit Students: Daily Hours Expectations Page

div.div:
Welcome to our Woodlake Unified School District website. It is important for us to communicate with our stakeholders, and our website is one way to keep these lines open. We hope that you will find answers to your questions, and if you do not, please don’t hesitate to give us a call for clarification or help. Each school has its own website as well, so please visit these for site-specific pertinent information. Just use the easy drop-down menu for those schools.
Thank you for visiting the WUSD website.

p.span: Woodlake Unified provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.

button.class: btn btn-default
btn sb-organization-color-element-bg

div.p: As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
